Ru_trainchinese: tì: (графема) выдвижной ящик; бамбуковое решето; выдвижная часть кровати или кресла
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Although Chinese people spread throughout the world, generation after generation they keep a flag in the drawer to remind themselves of their heritage.
humanum_full_description_en:
" drawer " represents a multi-drawer, that is mounted on the tables, cabinets and other furniture can be drawn forward, to appliances containing material. For example, Bei Zhou Yuxin's "Mirror Poetry": "Temporarily set up makeup, and draw a mirror drawer." "Jin Ping Mei Ci Hua" Chapter 73: "Don't look at Chunmei, after receiving it, it seems like nothing is in the drawer." "A Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 42: "Four more thin silk baskets, four coarse silk baskets, four pens, [...] 20 catties of floating charcoal, one catty of willow charcoal, one wooden box of three drawers, and one meter of solid yarn , Two taels of ginger, half a catty of sauce."
160 Characters
humanum_short_description_en: " drawer " represents a multi-drawer, that is mounted on the tables, cabinets and other furniture can be drawn forward, to appliances containing material.
humanum_full_description:
「屜」多表示抽屜，即安裝在桌、柜等家具中可以抽出推進，用以盛物的器具。如北周庾信〈鏡賦〉：「暫設粧奩，還抽鏡屜。」《金瓶梅詞話》第73回：「春梅也不瞧，接過來似有如無掠在抽屜內。」《紅樓夢》第42回：「再要頂細絹籮四個，粗絹籮四個，擔筆四支，[……]浮炭二十斤，柳木炭一斤，三屜木箱一個，實地紗一丈，生薑二兩，醬半斤。」
160 Characters
humanum_short_description: 「屜」多表示抽屜，即安裝在桌、柜等家具中可以抽出推進，用以盛物的器具。

屜字的基本解释

屜
tì
同“屉”。

屜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tì］
［《集韻》他計切，去霽，透。］
亦作“1”。亦作“屉1”。
(1)扁平、匣状的盛器，抽屉。
(2)鞋垫。《集韵·去霁》：“屟，履中薦。或作屜。”后用以指物体上片形的附件，如窗屉、鞍垫、椅屉等。

屜字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【尸字部】　屜； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页302第26
【集韻】【類篇】?他計切，音替。履中薦也。或作?。

屜字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
屜字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
drawer
tì

drawer
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tì］
["Jiyun" he planned to cut, go to Ji, and thoroughly. ]
Also called "1". Also known as "Drawer 1".
(1) Flat, box-shaped containers and drawers.
(2) Insoles. "Ji Yun·Qu Ji": "Qi, recommended in the shoe. Or as a drawer." Later used to refer to the sheet-shaped accessories on the object, such as window drawers, saddle cushions, chair drawers, etc.
drawer
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[1st Yinji] [Department of Corpse Characters] 　 Ti; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 302 26
[Jiyun] [Classes]? He counts and replaces the sound. Recommended also in the performance. Or for?.
